test_scenarios.name: Login Successfully
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the Datadog dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: View CPU Utilization on a Single Host
steps: Select a host from the list.
Verify CPU utilization graph is displayed.
test_scenarios.expected_result: CPU utilization graph is displayed with current and historical data for the selected host.

test_scenarios.name: Perform a Basic Log Search
steps: Enter a keyword (e.g., 'error') in the search bar.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Logs containing the keyword 'error' are displayed in the Log Explorer.
